TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XamlXmlReader extends System.Xaml.XamlReader implements class System.Xaml.IXamlLineInfo
Public Class XamlXmlReader Inherits XamlReader Implements IXamlLineInfo
public ref class XamlXmlReader : System::Xaml::XamlReader, System::Xaml::IXamlLineInfo
type XamlXmlReader = class inherit XamlReader interface IXamlLineInfo

summary.span: 處理 XML 檔案中的 XAML 標記 (使用 媒介)，並產生 XAML 節點資料流。

span.span: Processes XAML markup from XML files by using an intermediary, and produces a XAML node stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建構、需要。When you construct a , an is required. 這種設計目的是為了處理，從檔案取得資料流和等等的資料流輸入使用已建立的.NET Framework Api，針對 XML 處理。The purpose of this design is to use established .NET Framework APIs for XML processing in order to handle stream input, to obtain a stream from a file, and so on. 是標準的載入路徑 XAML 作業的第一個元件，就會由合併以及由載入 XAML 數個現有架構 XAML 實作所。 is the first component of the standard load path for XAML operations and is incorporated by as well as by several existing framework XAML implementations for loading XAML.

summary.span: 取得值，這個值指定行資訊是否可供使用。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether line information is available.

value.span: 如果有可用的行資訊則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if line information is available; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是屬於實作。This property is part of the implementation. 結果部分取決於用來初始化這個讀取器設定。The result is partially based on the reader settings that were used to initialize this .

public: virtual property bool IsEof { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值會報告讀取器在 XAML 節點資料流中是否位於檔案結尾。

span.span: Gets a value that reports whether the reader position in the XAML node stream is at end-of-file.

value.span: 如果位置是在節點資料流中的概念檔案結尾則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the position is at the conceptual end-of-file in the node stream; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您目前使用的樹狀子目錄的讀取器，樹狀子目錄的讀取器報告之後結束的樹狀子目錄的界限。If you are currently using a subtree reader, the subtree reader reports after exiting the bounds of the subtree. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LineNumber As Integer
public: property int LineNumber { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得要報告的行號。

span.span: Gets the line number to report.
The line number to report.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是屬於實作。This property is part of the implementation. 節點類型， ， ，或可以傳回行號。Node types of , , , or can return a line number. 其他節點類型都會傳回值為 0。Other node types return a value of 0. 所有節點類型則都傳回 0是`false`。All node types return 0 if is `false`.

public: virtual property System::Xaml::XamlMember ^ Member { System::Xaml::XamlMember ^ get(); };

summary.span: 如果目前讀取器位置在 上，則取得讀取器位置上的目前成員。

span.span: Gets the current member at the reader position, if the current reader position is on a .

value.span: 目前的成員，如果目前讀取器位置不在成員上，則為 。

span.span: The current member; or , if the current reader position is not on a member.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Namespace As NamespaceDeclaration
public: virtual property System::Xaml::NamespaceDeclaration ^ Namespace { System::Xaml::NamespaceDeclaration ^ get(); };

summary.span: 從目前的節點取得 XAML 命名空間。

span.span: Gets the XAML namespace from the current node.

value.span: 目前節點中的 XAML 命名空間 (如果有的話)，否則為 。

span.span: The XAML namespace from the current node, if it is available; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性僅擁有非 null 結果，如果目前位置是。This property only has a non-null result if the of the current position is . 這個屬性不會報告適用於物件或成員的一般範圍的意義上的 XAML 命名空間。This property does not report the XAML namespace that applies to objects or members in a general scoping sense. 如果您需要針對特定作業，您的實作應該快取 XAML 命名空間資訊。Your implementation should cache XAML namespace information if you need it for specific operations. 預設作業牽涉到載入的 XAML 結構描述的內容，這做角色 XAML 命名空間在內部快取 XAML 寫入器實作。For default operations that involve the loaded XAML schema context, the acting XAML namespace is internally cached by XAML writer implementations.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property NodeType As XamlNodeType
public: virtual property System::Xaml::XamlNodeType NodeType { System::Xaml::XamlNodeType get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前節點的類型。

span.span: Gets the type of the current node.
A value of the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Read() cil managed
Public Overrides Function Read () As Boolean

summary.span: 從載入的來源中提供下一個 XAML 節點 (如果有 XAML 節點的話)。

span.span: Provides the next XAML node from the loaded source, if a XAML node is available.

returns.span: 如果有節點則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if a node is available; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 節點位置傳回`false`也會傳回`true`如。A node where returns `false` also returns `true` for . 呼叫通常有副作用來提前或。Calling generally has the side effect of advancing the or . 下一個作業呼叫之後及取得`true`結果通常是為了檢查。The next operation after calling and getting a `true` result is typically to check . 如需 XAML 節點資料流概念的詳細資訊，請參閱[了解 XAML 節點資料流結構和概念](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/understanding-xaml-node-stream-structures-and-concepts.md)。For more information about XAML node stream concepts, see [Understanding XAML Node Stream Structures and Concepts](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/understanding-xaml-node-stream-structures-and-concepts.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SchemaContext As XamlSchemaContext
public: virtual property System::Xaml::XamlSchemaContext ^ SchemaContext { System::Xaml::XamlSchemaContext ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得物件，這個物件會為資訊集提供結構描述資訊。

span.span: Gets an object that provides schema information for the information set.

value.span: 物件，會為資訊集提供結構描述資訊。

span.span: An object that provides schema information for the information set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個值會是預設 XAML 結構描述內容或特別是在衍生的 XAML 結構描述內容可提供做為建構函式資訊。This value is either the default XAML schema context or a specifically derived XAML schema context that is provided as constructor information. 結構描述內容會影響 XAML 處理行為的許多層面。Schema context affects many aspects of XAML processing behavior. 特別是，的讀取器通常是由任何相關聯的寫入器。In particular, the of the reader is generally used by any associated writer.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Type As XamlType
